SEARCH
程序包 Controller

类 AdminController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
Manages administrator operations for the finance management system, including user account modification, customer inquiries, user deletion, and data import. Interacts with the AdminView for UI updates and AccountRepository for data operations.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private final AccountRepository
    accountRepository
    Repository for managing user account data.
    private AdminView
    view
    Admin view for displaying UI components, initialized lazily.

    构造器
    构造器
    说明

    Constructs an AdminController with the specified account repository.

  • 字段详细资料

    • accountRepository

      private final AccountRepository accountRepository
      Repository for managing user account data.

    • view

      private AdminView view
      Admin view for displaying UI components, initialized lazily.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AdminController

      public AdminController(AccountRepository accountRepository)
      Constructs an AdminController with the specified account repository. Initializes required CSV files for accounts and transactions.
      参数:
      accountRepository - the repository for user account data
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if file initialization fails

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeView

      private void initializeView()
      Initializes the AdminView lazily if not already created.

    • showDashboard

      void showDashboard()
      Displays the dashboard panel in the AdminView.

    • handleModifyCustomer

      private void handleModifyCustomer(String[] credentials)
      Handles the modification of a customer account by prompting for admin credentials and customer username, then displaying a modification dialog.
      参数:
      credentials - an array containing [username, password] for admin verification

    • handleModifyConfirm

      private void handleModifyConfirm(AdminView.ModifyCustomerDialog modifyView)
      Confirms and processes the modification of a customer account based on dialog input.
      参数:
      modifyView - the dialog containing updated customer information
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if admin verification fails or data saving fails

    • handleCustomerInquiry

      private void handleCustomerInquiry(List<User> ignored)
      Retrieves and displays the list of customer accounts in the AdminView.
      参数:
      ignored - unused parameter (reserved for future use)
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if account data cannot be loaded

    • handleDeleteUsers

      private void handleDeleteUsers(Set<String> usernamesToDelete)
      Deletes the specified user accounts from the repository.
      参数:
      usernamesToDelete - a set of usernames to be deleted
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if deletion fails

    • handleImportAccounts

      private void handleImportAccounts(File file)
      Imports customer account data from a specified CSV file.
      参数:
      file - the CSV file containing account data
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if import fails

    • handleImportTransactions

      private void handleImportTransactions(File file)
      Imports transaction records from a specified CSV file.
      参数:
      file - the CSV file containing transaction data
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if import fails

    • handleLogout

      private void handleLogout()
      Logs out the current admin user and closes the AdminView.

    • ensureFileExists

      private void ensureFileExists(String filePath, String expectedHeader) throws IOException
      Ensures that the specified CSV file exists, creating it with the expected header if necessary.
      参数:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      expectedHeader - the expected header line for the CSV file
      抛出:
      IOException - if file creation or writing fails
